Patients stratify accord organ involvement chronic graft-versus-host disease ( GVHD ) ( single organ vs multiple organ ) transplant center . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . Quality life assess baseline every 3 month . Patients follow every 3 month 3-5 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 230 patient ( 115 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 3 year .
